patthana13.22:1.1_0: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.22:1.1_1: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.22:1.1_2: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.22:1.1_3: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho ca naanidassanaappaṭigho
patthana13.22:1.1_4: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho
patthana13.22:1.1_5: ca naanidassanaappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ
patthana13.22:1.1_6: dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho ca naanidassanasappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.22:2.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.
patthana13.22:3.1: Anidassanasappaṭighañca anidassanaappaṭighañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana13.22:4.1: Hetuyā aṭṭhārasa, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate aṭṭhārasa. (Sabbattha vitthāro. Sahajātavārampi …pe… sampayuttavārampi vitthāretabbaṁ.)
patthana13.22:5.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo naanidassanaappaṭighassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana13.22:5.1_1: Anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo nasanidassanasappaṭighassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana13.22:5.1_2: Anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo naanidassanasappaṭighassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana13.22:5.1_4: ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo naanidassanasappaṭighassa
patthana13.22:5.1_5: ca naanidassanaappaṭighassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Anidassanaappaṭigho
patthana13.22:5.1_6: dhammo nasanidassanasappaṭighassa ca naanidassanasappaṭighassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana13.22:6.1: Sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo nasanidassanasappaṭighassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana13.22:7.1_0: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā dvādasa, anantare tīṇi …pe… sahajāte aṭṭhārasa,
patthana13.22:7.1_1: aññamaññe terasa, nissaye aṭṭhārasa, upanissaye nava, purejāte aṭṭhārasa, pacchājāte
patthana13.22:7.1_2: cha, āsevane tīṇi, kamme vipāke āhāre cha, indriye nava, jhāne magge cha, sampayutte
patthana13.22:7.1_3: tīṇi, vippayutte nava …pe… avigate sattavīsa. (Pañhāvāraṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.)
